text:
Nice place to get your rocks!
Lava rock here is $2/kg which is about half of what others are selling.

They don‚Äôt provide plastic bags so do bring your own if you‚Äôre buying quite a lot.

Do note that the photo of the building is not the same.
I reached here looking for the building which I saw on Google maps but couldn‚Äôt find.

Turns out it‚Äôs inside this pee Huan trading co building.

This place sells different kind of pebbles (small chips to larger rock 12cm length) by weight ( min. 1kg).  I think some people visited the place to buy the pebbles for landscaping projects but I was there to buy rock for paper weight painting.  Their office is on the 2nd floor and their staff very friendly.   I was very glad that I was able to buy small retail quantities.
Great place to buy pebbles. Highly recommended :) Price reasonable and can choose your pebbles :) Friendly staffs.
Great variety and has a large storage space to satisfy our needs and requirements!
